descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=3]Click Video Tab for short test run of her kicking butt!
[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=3]I always scratched my head wondering why Camilla could be married but was never tagged in game as a potential follower? Because she can kick some serious butt however, I could do away with her always talking about "The Claw"! Anyway [/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=3]I present to you my version of Camilla Valerius. Nothing was tweaked as far as her original packages and dialog and you will still need AFT if you want her as a follower. And I'm assuming doing the Golden Claw quest 1st.  What you see is what you get. The non-vanilla custom armor, bow and dual daggers all come with her. She of course is waiting for you at Riverwood Trader arguing with her brother....

Stats:

Imperial Race
Speed-150
NON Essential
Combat set to use bow and daggers and NO spells. "Cast your fancy magic someplace else".
Health, Magicka, and Stamina set to 500. Carry weight set to 10,000

Required:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE by Groovtama[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url] [color=#00ffff][size=3]ONLY to make her a follower.

Installation:

Use NMM or manual

Credits:
[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin by HeroedeLeyenda[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70603/?]New Mikan Eyes by nerune[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85181/?]Dragon Steel Weapons by jet4571[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56115/?]EyeCandy Sexy Warrior Outfit by Exnem and an unknown Russian[/url]

[color=#00ffff][size=3]Nifscope/Nifmerge

Creation Kit

Skyrim
[/size][/color][/center]
author: shrinkydink67
